org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo browser compile if [ -e /root/tmp ] then rm -r /root/tmp fi
cd /sdcard/factory/ || exit 1 rm -r compile-browser || true mkdir compile-browser cd compile-browser/ echo installing headers... uname=`uname -r` echo uname=$uname uname_updated=$(echo "$uname" | sed "s/chai-//") echo updated to $uname_updated
apt-get -y -q install linux-headers-$uname_updated || exit 1 mv /usr/src/linux-headers-$uname_updated /usr/src/linux-headers-`uname -r` ln -nfs /usr/src/linux-headers-`uname -r` /lib/modules/`uname -r`/build ln -nfs /usr/src/linux-headers-`uname -r` /lib/modules/`uname -r`/source
apt-get install -y git make usbutils build-essential cmake curl pkg-config python sshpass unzip

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "Shell used: $0"
tmp_folder=/tmp/gitter/$JOB_NAME/$BUILD_NUMBER echo working on $tmp_folder mkdir -p $tmp_folder cd $tmp_folder
echo Branch param $build_branch clean_build_branch=$build_branch clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"remotes/"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"branches/"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"refs/heads/"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"tags/"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"trunk"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"master"} echo Cleaned branch param $clean_build_branch
branch_param= branch_name=
if [ -z $build_branch ] || ! [[ "$build_branch" == *\/* ]] || [ "$build_branch" = "trunk" ] then echo No build branch chosen else branch_name=$clean_build_branch
if [ -z $branch_name ] then echo Master branch chosen.. else branch_param="-b $branch_name" echo Cloning branch and param $branch_name and $branch_param fi fi this_dir=$(pwd) repo_storage=/var/lib/jenkins/userContent/chaibio_repo if [ -e $repo_storage/chaipcr ] then echo found a previous repo copy cd $repo_storage cd chaipcr git pull else echo folder not found, creating the folder and fetching repo: $repo_storage/chaipcr mkdir -p $repo_storage cd $repo_storage git clone $branch_param https://github.com/chaibio/chaipcr.git fi cd $this_dir echo returning to $this_dir if [ -e chaipcr ] then sudo rm -r chaipcr fi if [ -e $repo_storage/chaipcr ] then cp -r $repo_storage/chaipcr . fi
if [ -e chaipcr ] then echo using preloaded copy of repo else git clone $branch_param https://github.com/chaibio/chaipcr.git || exit 1 fi cd chaipcr || exit 1
if [ -z $branch_name ] then echo No build branch chosen else git checkout $branch_name fi cd .. echo copying repo to $build_machine retry=0 until rsync --delete --rsh="sshpass ssh -o ServerAliveInterval=600 -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no -l root" -a ./chaipcr "$build_machine:/sdcard/factory/compile-browser/" do if [ $retry -gt 10 ] then echo error copying files to device exit 1 fi echo "Retrying in 5 seconds..." sleep 5 retry=$((retry+1)) done
sudo rm -r $tmp_folder exit 0

org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo browser compile
cd /sdcard/factory/compile-browser/chaipcr/browser/ || exit 1
rm /sdcard/factory/compile-browser/chaipcr/realtime/libraries/lib/libPoco* rm /sdcard/factory/compile-browser/chaipcr/realtime/libraries/lib/libboost* rm /sdcard/factory/compile-browser/chaipcr/realtime/libraries/lib/libsoci*
/opt/QtEmbedded/bin/qmake || exit 1 sed -i "s/arm-unknown-linux-gnueabi-//" Makefile sed -i '/^DEFINES[[:space:]]\+=/ s/$/ -DKERNEL_49/' Makefile
make || exit 1 make install || exit 1
if $is_dev then echo Building a debug image else cd /sdcard/factory/ || exit 1 rm -r compile-browser cd fi
echo done compiling browser
